alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 1:39PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PLUMAS...SIERRA AND SOUTHEASTERN LASSEN COUNTIES THROUGH 215 PM PDT... At 138 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Vinton, or 8 miles southwest of Chilcoot, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chilcoot, Vinton, Chilcoot-Vinton, Frenchman Lake, Loyalton, Ca 49 At Sierra-Plumas Co Line, Big Cove Campground, Chilcoot Campground, Frenchman Campground, Spring Creek Campground, and Beckwourth-Nervino Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
